bigText: 见证数字影响力的未来
smallText: 在InSnap中，您可以发现由人工智能驱动的虚拟影响者，体验他们惊人的个性，实时进行语音聊天，或者创建自己的自定义虚拟形象，加入这一革命。
feature1Description: Enjoy high-quality, engaging video posts from our AI influencers, updated daily with fresh, captivating content.
feature2Description: Have real, meaningful conversations with your favorite AI influencers through our advanced voice interaction system.
feature3Description: Design and customize your own AI avatar with unique traits, appearances, and personality traits using our intuitive creator tools.
